Printing, Viewing and Displaying
Wreath product elements are viewed, printed and displayed (see section for the distinctions between these operations) as extended tuples (see section ). For an example on the distinctions and outputs see .
The method Display allows an optional argument opts which must be a record and modifies the display output for the execution of only this single command.
For modifying the display output globally for all subsequent executions of Display see .
The following components of opts are supported.
horizontal
true to use the horizontal printer. DEFAULT
false to use the vertical printer.
labels
true to print labels. DEFAULT
false to suppress labels.
boldLabels
true for labels in bold font.
false for labels in normal font. DEFAULT
